name: Choplifter
overview: [Unreleased 1990] Get up soldier! Your helicopter just arrived, in time for you to go save your comrades. It's your mission to enter the Bungeling Empire territory and retrieve the 64 hostages from their prison barracks, and carry them to safety. Your reflexes and strategy skills will be tested as you dodge tanks, fighters, and air mines. You've got so little time, and the hostages are desperate. Bring 'em back alive!
